title: Shadowrun Dragonfall Director's Cut v.2.0.5 - 3DM Cracked
description:
Shadowrun Dragonfall Director's Cut v.2.0.5 - 3DM Cracked


Extract 7zip & play!


Release Notes 2.0.5

Bug Fixes

-Minor AI bug fixes and stability improvements.
-Resolved issue that allowed Armor spells to stack or apply the wrong value.
-Resolved issue that caused characters with 6 spells and a Totem to lose one spell.
-General optimization to improve loading times.

Bug Fixes: Dragonfall Campaign

-Added ability to use ESPs multiple times in Settling Debts mission.
-Clarified conversations concerning the Feuerstelle mission.
-Resolved issue that caused a conversation to start after getting a game over.

-Resolved issue that caused Air Spirit in MKVI to have incorrect stats.
-Resolved issue that caused a conversation to loop incorrectly in the Engineer mission.
-Resolved edge case issue in False Flags mission that allowed Player to exit with incorrectly set story variables.
-Resolved issue that could cause incorrect conversation options to show after MKVI mission.
-Resolved issue that caused incorrect UI text to be shown with Bliss Auto-Injector.
-Resolved issue that caused the Knight Kings of Lightninghold theme to stop playing at an incorrect time.
-Resolved issue that caused potential play blocker in Beneath the Kreuzbasar.
-Resolved issue that caused Team Advancement ability Ã¢â‚¬Å“Novahot TargetingÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ to not be rewarded correctly.
-Resolved issue that prevented selling of Paydata from the Trial Run.

-Other miscellaneous bug fixes and art polish.
